scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, depicted with long flowing hair and a golden halo, tenderly holds the Christ Child. She wears a red undergarment and a blue mantle. The Christ Child, also with a golden halo, is dressed in a blue tunic and holds a small object, possibly a prayer bead or a symbolic item. They are positioned against a dark blue background with vertical lines, suggesting an interior architectural setting. The scene is a devotional image of the Madonna and Child.
